segments.text: What's the matter , John ? you seemed to be restless today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You see , I've been offered a new job . I can't decide whether to take it or not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's easy . If it's better than the one you are doing now , go for it . That's my advice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It isn't that easy . I hate to quit my present job . People around here are very nice and the work itself is challenging .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what about the salary ? Would you get more ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they say I would get a big sum .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you discussed it with your wife ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , she leaves it to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As I say it the work is well worth try . After all you can get a higher salary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to think about it .
segments.speaker: S2
